data.description: A MUST SEE to appreciate!  5.5 acres with a stream and serene Blue Ridge Mtn views.  This lovely all brick home has freshly painted large living areas, 2 master bedrooms, 2 laundry rooms, 5 full baths, Oak & Walnut floors, & a workshop w/6 garages.  New roof/heat pumps in 2017, 50 KW backup whole house generator. County taxes, but minutes to amenities and downtown Mount Airy.  Less than 45 minutes to Winston Salem! Please see attached floorplan!
